humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, there are no metastatic carcinomas found in the 29 assessed lymph nodes (right axillary nodes). Therefore, based on the rules provided, the N stage for this patient is N0, as per New Rule 11: N0 can indicate that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that 29 lymph nodes were removed from the right axilla and were found to be free of tumor. This indicates that there is no evidence of cancer spread to the lymph nodes, which corresponds to an N0 stage.
